nodes.text: These chambers were located in a building in Iridonia's capital city.
The chambers consisted of several rooms with big, open windows facing the Capital Square. It had a bed, at least one sofa and a workbench. The chamber walls were carved with ornate patterns.
Luke Skywalker once stayed in this apartment while visiting Iridonia as a New Republic ambassador. Here, he was attacked by a solid-state hologram of the late Sith Lord Darth Maul, but survived.
